Articles.Content:
I decided to go back to an old drawing, and remake a positive outcome to it.

Before:

After:
That is a very big leap for kerbalkind. In art.

That is a very big leap for kerbalkind. In art.

Hahaha! Thanks! When I was making the new one I was thinking to myself "My drawing style sure has come along way" XD

Hahaha! Thanks! When I was making the new one I was thinking to myself "My drawing style sure has come along way" XD

Exactly what I was thinking. Good job with this art, keep it coming.

(Also, I noticed you changed your title from "The Stupid one" to "The Irish one". I'm not trying to sound rude, but could you please change it back? I liked it the way it was before, and your location already says you are in (and presumably live in too) Ireland. Again, I'm not trying to sound rude; I'm just saying this as a suggestion. You are still awesome, as well as your vids!)

Exactly what I was thinking. Good job with this art, keep it coming.

(Also, I noticed you changed your title from "The Stupid one" to "The Irish one". I'm not trying to sound rude, but could you please change it back? I liked it the way it was before, and your location already says you are in (and presumably live in too) Ireland. Again, I'm not trying to sound rude; I'm just saying this as a suggestion. You are still awesome, as well as your vids!)

Thanks!

(Well, I mean, I guess you are right, but "The Stupid One", although is very true, (XD) is just a bit, meh. I think if I change my location to something else, like "Where do you think?" Considering it says "The Irish One", that will make a bit more sense. I don't know. )
